forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 75. Northeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. North northeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.
